amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to codify a Senate rule that brings transparency to sources of compensation for Congressional fellowships, applying it to both chambers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx (NC) amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx (NC) amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Ms. Foxx (NC).
